Reviews.Title: good camera.
Reviews.Author: Henry
Reviews.Content: Great products. lots of new features comparing to the older NEX products. check it out at Sony's website and you will learn more about this product.

ProductInfo.Features:
DSLR-quality in about half the size and weight
16 MP APS-C sensor with fast up to 10 fps shooting speed
Fast Hybrid AF includes phase-detection for DSLR-like focus
Full HD movie shooting at 60p/24p with full exposure control
Wi-Fi® sharing and downloadable camera apps
ProductInfo.Name: Sony NEX-5R/S 16.1 MP Compact Interchangeable Lens Digital Camera with 3-Inch LCD - Body Only (Silver)
